Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound  Reroute near Desplaines/Fulton
ShortDescription: Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Fulton Market, Clinton, Randolph, Desplaines, due to street blockage near Desplaines/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Fulton Market, Clinton, Randolph, Desplaines then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near  Desplaines/Fulton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are delayed near Skokie. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
